title: CHC怎么用扣除多少点券换成多少金币---急急急
author: lfd512
txt_content:
扣除100点券换10000金币

具体怎么写，求大神帮忙写一下

replies.author: lfd512
replies.txt_content: 标题: CHC怎么用扣除多少点券换成多少金币---急急急RT 急需

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
chestcommand？
设置point:100
command:op:eco give {player} 10000

replies.author: sfter
replies.txt_content:
snowclay 发表于 2015-10-4 22:33
chestcommand？
设置point:100
command:op:eco give {player} 10000
经测试，然并卵~

replies.author: lfd512
replies.txt_content:
sfter 发表于 2015-10-4 22:35
经测试，然并卵~
dqhjb:
  NAME: '&a&l点券换金币&e[v]'
  point: 100
  ID: 384
  LORE:
    - '&d[v]点击扣除100点券'
    - '&e[v]然后获得10000金币'
    - '&c[cross]请谨慎点击！！！'
  COMMAND: 'givemoney:10000'
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 4


这样可以么= =

replies.txt_content: 对对对我也是这种原因我的是1.6.4的= =
